---
title: "Lecture slides"
output: html_document
---


Unlike the handouts on the [schedule](../schedule.html) tab, these links go directly to the slide decks.

```{r echo=FALSE}
slides = list.files(pattern = ".html")
slides = slides[slides != "index.html"]
lslides = paste0('<a href=',slides,'>',stringr::str_remove_all(slides,".html"), "</a>")
knitr::kable(lslides, col.names = "Lecture slides")
```
